IF (OBJECT_ID('enrollees_has_subjects') IS NULL) BEGIN CREATE TABLE enrollees_has_subjects ( subject_id BIGINT NOT NULL, enrollee_id BIGINT NOT NULL, score SMALLINT NOT NULL,
CONSTRAINT PK_enrollees_has_subjects PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (subject_id, enrollee_id),
CONSTRAINT CHK_enrollees_has_subjects_score CHECK (score >= 0 AND score <= 100),
CONSTRAINT FK_enrollees_has_subjects_subject_id FOREIGN KEY (subject_id) REFERENCES subjects (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,
CONSTRAINT FK_enrollees_has_subjects_enrollee_id FOREIGN KEY (enrollee_id) REFERENCES enrollees (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) END
